text: hi everyone today I will share with you
fire recipes for drinking snack let's
start with beef tendon and green fruit
salad ambarella is a great crunchy and
sour vegetables seal and cut into cubes
together with green mango and green
apple then soaked in salted water to
prevent darkening next grill a piece of
ginger a star nice and a cinnamon stick
until fragrant combined with the beef
tendon in the pressure cooker together
with some salt cook for about 30 to 40
minutes until the tendon is tender next
make a great salad dressing with some
sugar fish sauce vinegar mince garlic
and chilies also add some julienned
ginger tinglies lights lemongrass and
chili flakes for extra heat now come by
the tendon with the green fruits and
toss well with the salad dressing as
some more Vietnamese hurts like mints or
patient by sauce and you will have a
great appetizer while waiting for the
next dish to come last snack on some
garlicky spicy peanuts wash the raw
unpeeled peanuts then roast in a large
wok with 2 TSP of salt the salt will
help the peanuts
to roast evenly and avoid burning check
out the excess salt next peel a whole
head of garlic and mince finely with
some chilies heat vegetable oil in a pan
and fry the minced garlic and chili
until fragrant strain the oil to catch
the garlic chips
mix it with salt and sugar hit some
vegetable oil in a large wok and some
sugar a dash of water then add the
roasted peanuts and the garlic chips and
stir well until it get all shiny and
sticky mmm it tastes so good
let's continue with beef in a clay pot
slide the B Stingley against the grain
then mince up some lemongrass and garlic
then fry the minced garlic and
lemongrass separately until golden brown
now season the beef with salt pepper and
some five-spice powder then add the
golden garlic and lemongrass and some
julienned ginger
grease the base of your mini clay pot
with some garlic oil has something Li
slice onion and some of the beef place
the clay pot into a deep plate pour
rubbing alcohol into it and put on some
fire the burning flame will cook the
beef in the clay pot in just a few
minutes mmm smells so good you can serve
with a piece of cracker or roll up with
fresh wings in a piece of rice paper net
dish is Tim prawn with beer with green
chili dipping sauce green chili peppers
remove the seeds and roughly chopped
cut a few young lime leaves into five
threads
trim away the peel of a whole line then
cut into small pieces and combine with
some salt and sugar a good spoon up
spittin condensed meal will bring
everything together pause to process
until smooth and put into the
refrigerator
place the large prawns on the rack of a
steamer pour some beer into the water in
the steamer steam for about 3 minutes
then crush some lemongrass and a few
slices of ginger and steam until is
getting more fragrant
take out the dipping sauce and enjoy
last but not least grill beef with
mustard greens finely mince some garlic
and chilies thinly slice the shallots
heat some oil in a pan and fry the
shallots until fragrant then add the
minced garlic and chilli some soy sauce
sugar stock powder stir well and simmer
until the sauce thickens turn off the
heat and let to cool cut the beef into
strips and combine with the marinade mix
well and let sit for about 30 min and
then put on the grill oh it's so juicy
and smell really good wrap in a piece of
mustard greens and dip into the chili
sauce mmm so yummy I hope you enjoyed
today recipes don't forget to subscribe
thank you for watching bye bye
